"Lisa": "You were amazing. It's like you have me under a spell. You could put a bullet in me now and I wouldn't even care."
"Of course, I don't really mean that, so don't get any funny ideas. I may like shooting, but getting shot? Not so much."
"Plus, as much fun as it would be to battle someone like you, it would be a waste to have to kill you. A real waste."
"So let's stay on the same side, okay? That way we can keep on shooting, tormenting, and killing hostiles together."
"If we keep this up, we'll eventually have peace someday--although, to be honest, that's not really why I do this... "
